example.text: This week, House Republicans are taking up a measure that would dismantle [[user]]' student debt relief, negatively impact borrowers and cause confusion for public servants who have long experienced delays and bottlenecks in receiving the loan forgiveness they earned.

Today, [[user]] #SubHealth is considering 17 bills, including a bipartisan bill I’ve introduced with [[user]] that will give CMS the tools it needs to increase transparency and ultimately lower costs for seniors in Medicare. Tune in: [[url]]

[[user]]’s proposed standards for power plants will take a major step in tackling climate change and protecting clean air. Avoiding over 600 million metric tons of pollution is the equivalent to reducing the annual emissions of half our nation’s cars. [[url]]

It was great to tour [[user]]’s new surgical technology apprenticeship lab and discuss its programs, including the Licensed Practical Nurse apprenticeship. These programs will help address our health care workforce shortages by training students to step into high-demand jobs. [[url]]

Madam Speaker, due to testing positive for COVID-19 and following recommended isolation protocols, I was unable to vote today. Had I been present, I would have voted ``nay'' on rollcall no. 122, ``nay'' on rollcall no. 123, and ``nay'' on rollcall no. 124.
